section.label: libraries
section.title: Libraries
section.p: Ronin's dependencies (such as do_sqlite3 and nokogiri) require certain libraries and their header files to be installed:
section.shell: $ sudo apt-get install libxml2 libxml2-dev libxslt1-dev sqlite3 libsqlite3-dev

section.label: ruby
section.title: Ruby
section.p: If you already haven't done so, we must fully install Ruby on the system.
section.shell: $ sudo apt-get install ruby ruby-dev rdoc irb libyaml-ruby libjson-ruby libopenssl-ruby

section.label: rubygems
section.title: RubyGems
section.p: Since Debian's package for RubyGems is woofly out of date, we shall install the most recent RubyGems from source.

note.p: This section can be skiped all together if you are using Ruby 1.9.1 or above.

section.shell: $ wget http://rubyforge.org/frs/download.php/45905/rubygems-1.3.1.tgz $ tar -xzvf rubygems-1.3.1.tgz $ cd rubygems-1.3.1 $ sudo ruby setup.rb

note.p: If you are using Debian's version of RubyGems, you must add /var/lib/gems/1.8/bin/ to your PATH variable.

section.p: For Ruby 1.8.x and earlier you'll have to edit your .bashrc or .profile file in order to have Ruby automatically load rubygems.

section.label: ronin
section.title: Ronin
section.p: Now that your Debian system has been properly setup with Ruby, we can finally install Ronin:
